uk.co.mccann.socialpeek.service
Class AbstractSocialService

java.lang.Object
  uk.co.mccann.socialpeek.service.AbstractSocialService
All Implemented Interfaces:
Peekable, Service, SocialService
Direct Known Subclasses:
DeliciousService, LastFMService, TechnoratiService, TwitterService, WeFeelFineService
public abstract class AbstractSocialService
extends java.lang.Object
implements SocialService

AbstractSocialService
All services should subclass this class.
